numberNibbler.name: Number Nibbler
numberNibbler.description: A cute, round creature with big eyes and a mouth shaped like a plus sign.

subtractionSerpent.name: Subtraction Serpent
subtractionSerpent.description: A long, sleek creature with scales that look like minus signs.
subtractionSerpent.catchPhrase: I'll charm you with some smooth subtraction!

multiplyMoth.name: Multiply Moth
multiplyMoth.description: A colorful moth with wing patterns that resemble multiplication tables.

divisionDragon.name: Division Dragon
divisionDragon.description: A majestic dragon whose scales are arranged in perfect divisible patterns.
divisionDragon.catchPhrase: Divide and conquer, that's my motto!

fractionFox.name: Fraction Fox
fractionFox.description: A sly fox with a tail that can split into equal parts.
fractionFox.catchPhrase: Let's slice and dice those fractions!

decimalDolphin.name: Decimal Dolphin
decimalDolphin.description: A playful dolphin that can precisely divide itself into tenths and hundredths.
decimalDolphin.catchPhrase: Dive deep into the world of decimals!

percentagePenguin.name: Percentage Penguin
percentagePenguin.description: A dapper penguin with a tuxedo pattern that constantly shifts in percentage increments.
percentagePenguin.catchPhrase: 100% ready for a cool percentage challenge!

algebraicApe.name: Algebraic Ape
algebraicApe.description: A wise-looking ape that juggles variables and equations with ease.
algebraicApe.catchPhrase: X marks the spot for algebraic adventures!

geometryGiraffe.name: Geometry Giraffe
geometryGiraffe.description: A tall giraffe whose spots form various geometric shapes.
geometryGiraffe.catchPhrase: Let's shape up our geometry skills!

probabilityPanda.name: Probability Panda
probabilityPanda.description: A cuddly panda with black and white fur that rearranges in random patterns.
probabilityPanda.catchPhrase: What are the odds we'll have fun? 100%!

statisticsSquirrel.name: Statistics Squirrel
statisticsSquirrel.description: An energetic squirrel that collects and organizes data acorns.
statisticsSquirrel.catchPhrase: Let's crunch some numbers and gather data!

trigonometryTurtle.name: Trigonometry Turtle
trigonometryTurtle.description: A thoughtful turtle whose shell patterns represent sine, cosine, and tangent waves.
trigonometryTurtle.catchPhrase: Slow and steady wins the trig race!

calculusCat.name: Calculus Cat
calculusCat.description: A sleek cat that can instantly calculate areas under curves with its whiskers.
calculusCat.catchPhrase: Let's derive some fun and integrate excitement!

vectorVulture.name: Vector Vulture
vectorVulture.description: A majestic vulture whose flight path always follows perfect vector calculations.
vectorVulture.catchPhrase: Let's soar through vector space together!

matrixMeerkat.name: Matrix Meerkat
matrixMeerkat.description: A vigilant meerkat that can arrange itself into perfect rows and columns.
matrixMeerkat.catchPhrase: Stand tall and let's solve this matrix!
